verses.name: Psalms 55:1
verses.text: Give ear to my prayer, O God; and hide not thyself from my supplication.

verses.name: Psalms 55:2
verses.text: Attend unto me, and hear me: I mourn in my complaint, and make a noise;

verses.name: Psalms 55:3
verses.text: Because of the voice of the enemy, because of the oppression of the wicked: for they cast iniquity upon me, and in wrath they hate me.

verses.name: Psalms 55:4
verses.text: My heart is sore pained within me: and the terrors of death are fallen upon me.

verses.name: Psalms 55:5
verses.text: Fearfulness and trembling are come upon me, and horror hath overwhelmed me.
